title: Recidivism Watch: Marco Rubio’s repeated claim about recidivism among Guantanamo ex-detainees
subtitle: Rubio likes to bash Obama for recidivism among ex-detainees, but few released under Obama's term have returned to militant activities.
author: www.washingtonpost.com
